column1: Whoa, look at this! I just did the heatie thermal thingie to the video! It's all orangie!
That's the thermals. They make a proof and the thermals!
No doubt about it! It's a three foot tall bunny-man!
Bobo got it! Bobo got the bunnymaaan!
Alright.  I got the evidence right here. The dart gun I shot the bunnyman with.
